<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Search Locations"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/search/v2"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Performs an advanced search using v2 query semantics, returning results based on the filter criteria encoded by the client and contextual headers. Use this endpoint when you need the newer search pipeline (v2) for location or resource discovery and want results scoped by the caller, site, or product context supplied via headers.

**Workflow Example**
1. Set contextual headers (for example `SiteId`, `ProductId`, and `Client`) to scope the search.
2. Submit [POST /api/v1.0/search/v2](/docs/api/search/search-v-2s) and review the response payload for the matching records returned by the v2 search engine.

**Minimal Required Fields**: none (headers optional, but recommended to scope results).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"Client","in":"header","required":false,"example":"WebBrowser","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"ProductId","in":"header","required":false,"example":0,"schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":false,"example":"{{BasicAuth}}","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"example":"{{SiteId}}","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
